body: Pro tip: When picking your startup name make sure it's not used by multiple other startups as well. 🤦‍♂️

For weeks, I've been getting letters in the form of scrolls sent to me at work. Each one was creepily signed: "More to come." 

It ended up being a PR campaign for some healthcare startup. Pro tip: This is not a good use of your VC funding.

Finally after 9 months of waiting, I’m going to start my new adventure with a startup in Paris. Extremely difficult decision, but I’m even more anxious about adjusting to the culture and the language. Any tips welcome! 😄
@Startup_Canada @QuickBooksCA I don’t own a business, but am beginning to do some freelance work, and am learning so much about costs and pricing! Anyone have more tips? #StartupChats
